news.title: Crypto for Advisors: The Regulators are Here
news.text: As the crypto industry matures, regulators have indicated they will continue to focus on crypto after the spot bitcoin ETF approvals.

news.title: South Korea Considers Removing Income Tax on Crypto Earnings
news.text: Responding to queries about the potential removal of income tax on gains from various financial investments, including cryptocurrencies, Deputy Minister Jeong Jung-hoon emphasized the government's contemplation of such a move.

news.title: Chainalysis Report: Crypto Crime Dropped $15B Last Year
news.text: Illicit cryptocurrency transaction volume dropped nearly 40% in 2023 to $24.2 billion but trends diverged across scamming, hacking, ransomware and other crime categories according to Chainalysis' latest crypto crime report.

news.title: Green Mining: Exploring Environmentally-Friendly Practices In The Cryptocurrency Industry
news.text: Cryptocurrencies have gained increased mainstream attention in the past decade. These currencies and the technologies behind them can be complex but offer significant promise, especially in finance and trading.

news.title: Former OpenSea manager appeals conviction, claiming NFT info isn't ‘property'
news.text: In May 2023, a jury convicted Nathaniel Chastain of wire fraud and money laundering related to his knowledge of which NFTs would be featured on the OpenSea website.

news.title: Kiln Secures $17 Million to Fuel Expansion and Innovation in Crypto Staking
news.text: Kiln, a leading institutional crypto staking platform, has successfully closed a $17 million funding round, marking a significant milestone in its journey to reshape the digital assets ecosystem. The funding round, led by 1kx and featuring prominent participants like Crypto.com, IOSG, and Wintermute Ventures, reflects the industry's confidence in Kiln's innovative approach and strategic vision.

news.title: Towards Governance Abstraction: Understanding a 'Friendly' Way to Manage DAOs
news.text: Dagon, a technical implementation introduced by core developer Ross Campbell, looks to improve DAO governance and delegation using smart contracts.

news.title: No Decision on Coinbase vs. SEC Case, Legal Battle Continues
news.text: The SEC's lawsuit against Coinbase moves forward after the judge's decision not to dismiss the case.

news.title: EU reaches provisional agreement on stricter AML rules for crypto firms
news.text: The new requirements force know-your-customer (KYC) checks on transactions over 1,000 even those involving self-hosted wallets.

news.title: TradeStation Crypto Bows Out Of Spot Cryptocurrency Trading: What Investors Need To Know
news.text: TradeStation Crypto, a subsidiary of TradeStation Group, on Thursday announced its decision to exit the spot cryptocurrency trading business, marking a notable shift in the company's focus and strategy in the digital asset space. TradeStation, known for its electronic trading platform that caters to active traders and certain institutional investor markets, has been a significant player in the trading industry.

events.event_name: Robinhood significantly increases its holdings of Shiba Inu (SHIB), adding billions of tokens
events.event_text: Recently, the cryptocurrency Shiba Inu has gained a lot of attention on the popular trading platform Robinhood. This digital currency, often referred to as the "Dogecoin slayer," has seen a surge of interest from cryptocurrency enthusiasts. In just 24 hours, Robinhood acquired a whopping 231 billion Shiba Inu tokens, signaling its strong involvement in the crypto industry.

news.title: Robinhood Adds 202B SHIB Overnight as Other Whales Take Heed
news.text: The fourth largest Shiba Inu custodian adds another 202B, sounding the alarm for crypto whales to regain consciousness.

news.title: Robinhood Goes Shiba Crazy, Buys 230 Billion SHIB In 24 Hours – Here's The Scoop
news.text: On the widely-used trading platform Robinhood, Shiba Inu, frequently hailed as the “Dogecoin slayer,” has sparked a surge of enthusiasm within the cryptocurrency realm. In a remarkable turn of events, Robinhood amassed a staggering 231 billion tokens within a mere 24 hours, boldly proclaiming its presence in the crypto arena.

news.title: Robinhood's Shiba Inu ($SHIB) Wallet Adds Over 200 Billion Tokens in a Day Amid Ongoing Accumulation
news.text: A prominent Shiba Inu ($SHIB) community member has recently pointed out that data from Arkham Intelligence shows that the commission-free trading platform Robinhood (NASDAQ: HOOD) currently has 36.684 trillion SHIB tokens in its wallet.

news.title: Robinhood Boosts Shiba Inu Holdings As Whales' Accumulation Surge
news.text: Data from Arkham Intelligence reveals Robinhood's significant increase in Shiba Inu (SHIB) holdings. Shiba Inu enthusiast named “Lola” on social media platform X, highlights the recent surge, with Robinhood accumulating billions of SHIB within 24 hours.

news.title: Robinhood Adds Billions of Shiba Inu (SHIB) to Holdings: Details
news.text: Based on Arkham Intelligence data, Robinhood, the stock brokerage giant, seems to have recently increased its stash of Shiba Inu (SHIB), the second-largest dog-themed cryptocurrency by market capitalization.

news.text: The Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) community recently faced a setback as two crucial proposals aimed at enhancing the utility and security of the Terra Classic chain were rejected. Notably, a leading validator with 15% voting power, alongside other validators, voted against the proposals.

news.title: LUNC News: Here's Why Terra Luna Classic EVM & Validator Proposals Failed
news.text: The Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) community rejected two key proposals that would have helped boost the utility and security of the Terra Classic chain. A top validator with 15% voting power and other validators voted against the proposal, opposing the objective to introduce Ethereum virtual machine (EVM) support and restore validators count to 130.

events.event_name: TrueUSD Struggles to Maintain $1 Peg, Plunges to $0.97
events.event_text: The sentiment of the news articles is negative. They highlight that the stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) has experienced a significant drop in value, depegging from its expected $1 value. Traders have been dumping TUSD in favor of other stablecoins like USDT. The drop in value has raised concerns regarding the reserve attestation of TUSD.

news.title: TrueUSD attributes Binance Launchpool activities to recent stablecoin price deviation
news.text: Embattled TrueUSD (TUSD) stablecoin attributed the asset's recent price deviations from the $1 peg to the “community mining activities associated with Binance Launchpool,” which resulted in “short-term arbitrage opportunities.” TUSD's value has recovered to $0.9904 as of press time after falling to as low as $0.9708 during the past day, according to CryptoSlate's data.

news.title: TrueUSD struggles to maintain peg, drops to $0.97 amid negative net outflows
news.text: Traders have sold approximately $305 million worth of TUSD over the past day against only $129 million in buys.

news.title: TrueUSD deploys new reserve audit system in attempt to recover dollar peg
news.text: TrueUSD's price fell to $0.97 on Jan. 18 despite its efforts to assure users of its fiat reserves.

news.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegs To $0.9712, Here's Why.
news.text: TrueUSD (TUSD) recently experienced a significant de-pegging, plummeting to $0.9712 from its stable value. This comes after TUSD earlier dropped to $0.98.

news.title: TrueUSD on a wild ride: down to $0.97 and back to $0.99
news.text: Stablecoin TrueUSD has fallen down to $0.70 from its expected $1 peg after recent issues with its reserve attestation and quickly recovered

news.text: Some companies, however, are reporting redeem issues.

news.title: TrueUSD Wobbles Towards $1 Peg Amid Reported Redemption Issues

news.title: TrueUSD Continues To Spiral, Hits Low Of $0.97

news.title: TrueUSD continues to depeg, hits low point of $0.97
news.text: Stablecoin TrueUSD (TUSD) dropped to a point of around $0.9708 on Thursday morning in Asia. TUSD has since slightly recovered.

events.event_name: Thailand's SEC opens doors to retail investments in digital tokens
events.event_text: The Thai SEC has lifted restrictions on digital token investments, introducing new criteria to create a secure and dynamic digital asset landscape. This move is expected to benefit crypto enthusiasts in Thailand.

news.title: Thailand Allows Retail Investments in Infrastructure-backed Tokens
news.text: Thailand's Securities and Exchange Commission (TSEC) has removed restrictions for retail investors looking to buy digital tokens linked to real estate or infrastructure projects. The previous limit of 300,000 baht (around $8,500) on investments in these tokens by retail investors no longer applies.

news.title: Thailand opens doors to retail investments in infrastructure-backed digital tokens
news.text: The new rules cancel the previous limit of 300,000 baht ($8,500) for retail investors concerning investments in digital tokens backed by real estate or infrastructure.

news.title: Thailand SEC updates rules for digital token investments
news.text: Thailand's Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has recently updated its investment criteria for digital tokens. This revision, effective from January 16, 2024, marks a pivotal shift in the regulatory landscape for digital assets in Thailand, balancing investor protection with market development.

news.title: Thailand SEC Eases Restrictions on Digital Token Investments
news.text: The Thailand Securities and Exchange Commission has taken a pivotal step by lifting restrictions on digital token investments in individuals. The press release on January 18, by the Thai SEC is a strategic step toward improving investor protection, supporting technological innovation, and driving national growth through digital fundraising.

news.title: Thailand SEC Lifts Restriction On Digital Tokens Investment
news.text: Thailand's Office of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has lifted restrictions on digital token investments, ushering in a transformative era for crypto enthusiasts. Notably, the SEC's latest press release, dated January 18, unveils updated criteria aimed at fostering a secure and vibrant digital asset landscape.

events.event_name: Regulators Reject Spot Bitcoin ETFs in Thailand and Singapore
events.event_text: Thailand's SEC denies launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs, signaling a negative sentiment towards crypto in the country.

news.title: Singapore Strikes Out Spot Bitcoin ETFs for Retail Investors
news.text: Singaporean retail investors may still participate in Spot Bitcoin ETFs listed elsewhere. The regulatory body also cautioned those buying Bitcoin ETFs in foreign markets.

news.title: MAS Blocks BTC ETFs For Retail Investors In Singapore
news.text: The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has clarified its stand on exchange-traded funds, claiming that Bitcoin ETFs are part of CIS and are not approved for trade for retail investors in the country.

news.title: Singapore rejects Bitcoin Spot ETFs, US opens doors for investors
news.text: In a recent move, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) confirmed that it will not permit listing spot Bitcoin (BTC) ETFs for retail investors on local exchanges. This decision aligns with Singapore's current regulatory framework, which does not recognize cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin as suitable assets for Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs).

news.title: Bitcoin ETFs Face Regulatory Roadblock In Singapore – Here's Why
news.text: While Wall Street welcomes the first US-listed Bitcoin ETFs with open arms, Singapore remains wary. The Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has thrown cold water on the idea of offering these type of investments to retail investors, citing long-held concerns about the risks of cryptocurrency trading.

news.title: Singapore Says No to Retail Crypto ETFs
news.text: The Monetary Authority of Singapore declines retail spot Bitcoin ETF listings.

news.title: Singapore's MAS cautions investors against buying spot Bitcoin ETFs
news.text: The Monetary Authority of Singapore has warned retail investors against buying spot Bitcoin ETFs following U.S. approval.

news.title: Singapore MAS Firmly Opposes Spot Bitcoin ETF Listing
news.text: Spot Bitcoin Exchange-traded Funds (ETFs) recently received the SEC's approval in the U.S., garnering enormous market attention. In contrast, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has prohibited the listing of Spot Bitcoin ETFs for retail investors.

news.title: Thai Regulator Rejects Spot Bitcoin ETF, Citing Policy Lacuna
news.text: Thailand's Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has denied the launch of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the country.

events.event_name: dYdX Overtakes Uniswap as Top DEX by Daily Volume
events.event_text: The recent news articles are positive for dYdX, a decentralized exchange (DEX), as it has surpassed Uniswap, a leader in the sector, by recording the highest daily trading volume. dYdX achieved this milestone after migrating from the Ethereum blockchain to the Cosmos ecosystem. Its daily trading volume reached $757 million, making it the dominant DEX.

news.title: Subzero Temperatures in Texas Impact Bitcoin Hashrate Amidst Energy Strains
news.text: As Texas grapples with unexpected subzero temperatures, the state's bitcoin mining operations have shut down due to high energy demand. This has freed up much needed electricity capacity in the state, while also leading to a sharp drop in the global Bitcoin hashrate.

news.title: Bitcoin hash rate drops amid Texas freeze and miner sell-off
news.text: Recent extreme weather conditions in Texas have significantly impacted the Bitcoin network's hash rate, leading to a noteworthy decline in mining activities. As temperatures plummeted below freezing in mid-January, the Bitcoin hash rate experienced a sharp 34% drop, decreasing from over 629 exahashes per second (EH/s) to approximately 415 EH/s.

news.title: Bitcoin mining: hashrate drops by 25% in Texas
news.text: The mining companies have been forced to reduce their energy consumption.

news.title: Bitcoin Hash Rate Drops by 34% as Texas' Temperature Drops Below Zero
news.text: A sudden freeze in Texas has caused a significant drop in the Bitcoin hash rate, as miners in the state were forced to curtail operations to support the state's energy grid.

news.title: Bitcoin Hash Rate Tumbles as Halving Approaches
news.text: Bitcoin miners in Texas are curtailing power to ensure the stability of the state's power grid.

news.title: Bitcoin hash rate drops by 34% amid freezing temperatures in Texas
news.text: Many areas of the Lone Star State experienced subzero temperatures in January — a weather event that has previously led to Bitcoin miners temporarily curtailing operations.

news.title: Bitcoin mining hashrate falls by an estimated 25% amid Texas curtailment
news.text: Texas' deregulated energy market emerged as an attractive Bitcoin mining hub following China's crackdown on the industry in 2021.

events.event_name: Bitcoin mining hash rate declines substantially in Texas due to freezing temperatures.
events.event_text: The deregulated energy market in Texas became a popular destination for Bitcoin miners after China's crackdown on the industry.

news.title: Solana Memecoin Dogwifhat (WIF) Hits All-Time High Ahead of Binance and Kucoin Listing
news.text: Dogwifhat (WIF), the Solana meme coin that has steadily risen in popularity, hits an all-time high after the announcement of Binance listing its perpetual contract, it will also be listed on Kucoin.

news.title: Dogwifhat (WIF) Mysterious Buying Activity Ahead of Binance Listing: What's Happening?
news.text: Dogwifhat, an emerging meme coin from the Solana ecosystem, saw a substantial surge in buying activity just before Binance announced the launch of WIF perpetual contracts. However, there is a problem: speculation has appeared regarding potential insider knowledge, particularly following the revelation that an individual investor spent a staggering 86,738.1 SOL (equivalent to $8.65 million) to purchase 17.22 million WIF.

news.title: KuCoin to list Solana's memecoin Dogwifhat
news.text: Popular Solana memecoin Dogwifhat has secured another listing on KuCoin. The notable crypto exchange platform with over a million users worldwide is set to enable spot trading for Dogwifhat starting January 18 at 13:00 UTC.

news.title: Binance Adds Dogwifhat (WIF) as Solana Meme Coin Cap Hits $500M
news.text: In a major development today, Binance, the biggest cryptocurrency exchange globally, announced the official listing of Dogwifhat (WIF), the trending meme token on the Solana blockchain. The news, shared through Binance's official channels, disclosed that trading for Dogwifhat would start right away on Binance's futures market, giving traders the opportunity to use a maximum leverage level of 50x.

news.title: Dogwifhat Solana Meme Coin Surges 257% as SOL Tops $100
news.text: Dogwifhat (WIF) is the latest Solana meme coin making significant gains, with a remarkable 51% surge in the last 24 hours. Its current price stands at just over $0.42.

news.title: Binance Lists Dogwifhat (WIF) as Solana Meme Coin Market Cap Hits $500 Million
news.text: In a groundbreaking move today, Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, officially listed Dogwifhat (WIF), the hottest meme token on the Solana blockchain. The announcement, made through the exchange's official channels, revealed that trading for the Dogwifhat token would commence immediately on the Binance futures market, offering traders a maximum leverage level of 50x.

news.text: Meme coin Dogwifhat (CRYPTO: WIF), part of the Solana (CRYPTO: SOL) blockchain, experienced a 35% increase in its value within the last 24 hours, surpassing performance compared to top meme cryptocurrencies such as Dogecoin (CRYPTO: DOGE) and Shiba Inu (CRYPTO: SHIB). news.title: Solana Meme Coin Dogwifhat Spikes 257% as SOL Reclaims $100
news.text: BONK isn't the hottest Solana meme coin at the moment: WIF has more than doubled in price this week alone.

news.title: Solana Meme Coin Surges 25% on Major Exchange Listing
news.text: The well-known Solana meme coin, dogwifhat (WIF), saw its price shoot up by around 25% shortly after BitMEX added the perpetual swap contract WIF/USDT to its list of available trading options. This move brought a surge in the coin's value, showcasing the impact of exchange listings on meme coin dynamics.

news.text: WIF's price spiked to $0.34: very close to its all-time high of $0.37.

headlines.headline: Crypto Crime Decreased by $15 Billion in 2020: Chainalysis Report
headlines.text: Chainalysis' latest report on crypto crime reveals that illicit cryptocurrency transactions experienced a significant decline of almost 40% in 2023, totaling $24.2 billion. However, it is worth noting that there were differing trends observed across various forms of fraudulent activities such as scams, hacking, ransomware, and other forms of crime.

news.title: Chainalysis Report: Crypto Crime Dropped $15B Last Year
news.text: Illicit cryptocurrency transaction volume dropped nearly 40% in 2023 to $24.2 billion but trends diverged across scamming, hacking, ransomware and other crime categories according to Chainalysis' latest crypto crime report.

headlines.headline: BlackRock Has No Immediate Plans for XRP ETF
headlines.text: According to sources familiar with the matter, BlackRock, the biggest asset manager globally, has not indicated any plans to launch an exchange-traded fund (ETF) for XRP, the cryptocurrency associated with Ripple. This news comes after the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved a Bitcoin ETF.

news.title: BlackRock's XRP ETF Stance: No Immediate Plans in Sight
news.text: BlackRock, the world's largest asset manager, has yet to show any clear intentions of launching a spot XRP exchange-traded fund (ETF), per sources close to the matter. This development surfaces amid the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's (SEC) recent approval of a Bitcoin spot ETF.

headlines.headline: Tether's reserves see a boost with $380 million added to its $2.42 billion holdings
headlines.text: Tether's recent moves in acquiring Bitcoin and changing its investment approach have sparked curiosity about how it will affect the world of cryptocurrencies.

news.title: Tether Adds $380 Million to Its $2.42 Billion Stash
news.text: Tether's strategic Bitcoin acquisitions and evolving investment approach raise compelling questions about its impact on the cryptocurrency landscape.

headlines.headline: Manta Network Hit by DDoS Attack Following Exchange Listing
headlines.text: On Thursday, the nodes of the Manta blockchain were overwhelmed by an enormous influx of over 135 million RPC (Remote Procedure Call) requests.

news.title: Manta Network experiences DDoS attack amid exchange listing
news.text: Over 135 million RPC requests flooded Manta blockchain's nodes on Thursday.

headlines.text: Conflux Network, a blockchain company based in China, has announced an innovative solution called the EVM-compatible Bitcoin Layer 2 (BTC L2). This news has caused a significant increase in the value of Conflux (CFX), its native token, by over 8%.

news.title: CFX Price Rallies 8% As Conflux Unveils EVM-Compatible Bitcoin L2 Solution
news.text: Conflux Network, a China-based blockchain organization, has recently unveiled plans for a groundbreaking EVM-compatible Bitcoin Layer 2 (BTC L2) solution. This announcement propelled its native token Conflux (CFX) to gain over 8%.

news.title: Binance Records $5 Bln Inflow With BNB Price Soaring 30%, What's Next?
news.text: The leading global crypto exchange, Binance, which has recently faced regulatory hurdles and parted ways with its founder Changpeng “CZ” Zhao, is experiencing a resurgence in crypto inflows. Meanwhile, despite a multibillion-dollar penalty and legal challenges, Binance has witnessed a remarkable around $5 billion net influx within two months of its agreement with the US

headlines.headline: BlackRock explores blockchain's potential in smart contract supply chains, expanding beyond Bitcoin
headlines.text: In a recent interview at the VettaFi CryptoCurrency Symposium, Jay Jacobs, the U.S. Head of Thematics and Active Equity ETFs at BlackRock, discussed the process of launching the iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF (IBIT) and shared BlackRock's perspective on blockchain in the long run.

headlines.headline: Tron Founder Moves Billions of SHIB Tokens from Binance: Here's What You Need to Know
headlines.text: According to a recent report, Justin Sun, the founder of Tron blockchain and a crypto billionaire, has acquired a significant number of Shiba Inu meme coins.

news.title: Tron Founder Withdraws Billions of SHIB From Binance: Details
news.text: Justin Sun, founder of the Tron blockchain, its former chief executive and now a crypto billionaire who owns the Poloniex and Huobi cryptocurrency exchanges, has acquired a jaw-dropping amount of Shiba Inu meme coins, according to a recent report.

headlines.headline: South Korea reevaluates cryptocurrency taxation amidst financial reforms
headlines.text: South Korea is considering updating its tax rules for cryptocurrency gains to match the changes in the country's overall financial investment taxation policies. The government aims to create a new tax system that encourages citizens to accumulate wealth and make smart financial decisions.

headlines.headline: Binance Removes BTC, ETH, BNB Trading Pairs - But There's a Catch
headlines.text: Binance, the top cryptocurrency exchange in the world, recently removed several spot trading pairs involving Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Binance Coin (BNB). This action was taken as part of the exchange's routine audits of their trading pairs.

news.title: Binance Delists BTC, ETH, BNB Spot Trading Pairs But Here's The Catch
news.text: Binance, the leading cryptocurrency exchange globally, has delisted spot trading pairs concerning Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Binance Coin (BNB). The exchange is regularly conducting comprehensive reviews of all listed spot trading pairs, which spurred this move.

headlines.headline: OKX increases partnership with McLaren in response to growing interest from crypto companies in Formula 1
headlines.text: OKX has announced an expansion of their partnership with the McLaren Formula 1 team. Starting in 2024, OKX's branding will have a prominent presence on McLaren's race cars.

headlines.headline: Binance adds Dogwifhat (WIF) to trading platform, Solana meme coin surpasses $500M market cap
headlines.text: Binance, the world's largest cryptocurrency exchange, has made an exciting announcement by listing Dogwifhat (WIF), a popular meme token on the Solana blockchain. This means that traders can now trade the Dogwifhat token on Binance's futures market with a leverage level of up to 50x.

headlines.headline: Major Investment Firm, Franklin Templeton, Shows Confidence in Solana (SOL)
headlines.text: Recent news suggests that Solana (SOL) is gaining recognition and interest from top investment asset management firms. Franklin Templeton, a well-established asset manager with a long history, is the latest to show support for Solana. This endorsement highlights the growing appeal of Solana among institutional investors.

headlines.headline: ProShares to Launch Five New Bitcoin ETFs, Expanding Crypto Offerings
headlines.text: ProShares, a financial company, has announced their intentions to introduce five new Bitcoin ETFs. These ETFs will provide investors with leveraged and inverse exposure to Bitcoin through the Bloomberg Galaxy Bitcoin Index. This news is seen as a significant development in the world of cryptocurrency investment options.

headlines.headline: Singapore's MAS Strongly Opposes Approval of Bitcoin ETF Listing
headlines.text: Recently, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved Spot Bitcoin Exchange-traded Funds (ETFs), attracting significant interest from the market. However, the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) has banned the listing of Spot Bitcoin ETFs for retail investors.

headlines.headline: Thailand SEC eases limits on investing in digital tokens
headlines.text: Thailand's securities regulator, the SEC, has announced that it will no longer impose restrictions on investing in digital tokens. This move is expected to bring about significant changes and exciting opportunities for cryptocurrency enthusiasts. The updated criteria released by the SEC on January 18 are designed to create a safer and more dynamic environment for digital assets.

headlines.headline: Trump promises to block CBDC creation if elected
headlines.text: U.S. presidential candidate, Donald Trump, was met with enthusiasm and applause during a campaign speech in Portsmouth.

headlines.headline: Franklin Templeton Aims at Ethereum and Solana Following Bitcoin Success
headlines.text: The investment giant expressed optimism about Solana's vision and Ethereum's ecosystem in a positive Twitter thread.

headlines.headline: EU Implements Strict Crypto Due Diligence Measures to Fight Money Laundering
headlines.text: Crypto firms are now required to perform checks on transactions over 1000 euros. Additionally, the framework includes measures to reduce risks associated with transfers involving self-hosted wallets.

headlines.headline: Concerns Raised Over Stripe's Payment Policies Impacting Bitcoin Mining Hardware Sales
headlines.text: Recent posts on X platform have voiced concerns about Stripe's position on Bitcoin mining companies. Daniel Batten, the founder of CH4 Capital, directly addressed Stripe and challenged the notion that Bitcoin mining goes against environmental, social, and governance (ESG) objectives.

headlines.headline: IRS Indicates Crypto Not Subject to Controversial $10K Reporting Rule
headlines.text: Recent news articles indicate that two U.S. agencies have made an announcement on January 16, stating that the transaction reporting rules, which were contentious, do not affect digital assets, such as cryptocurrency. This development can be seen as positive for the crypto industry, as it clarifies the regulatory stance on digital assets.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin hash rate plummets by 34% due to severe cold in Texas
headlines.text: In January, several parts of Texas experienced extremely cold temperatures, which in the past has caused Bitcoin miners to pause their operations temporarily.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin: Michael Saylor responds to JPMorgan CEO's criticism of it as a 'Pet Rock'
headlines.text: After Jamie Dimon compared Bitcoin to a "pet rock," former MicroStrategy CEO Michael Saylor responded sarcastically. During an interview at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, Dimon reinforced his negative views on Bitcoin.

headlines.headline: Axiom Space Launches NFT Art Auction for ISS Mission
headlines.text: Axiom Space, the company preparing for a mission to the International Space Station (ISS), has initiated an exciting NFT auction. The auction will feature artwork created by talented individuals such as Erick Calderon and Amber Vittoria.

headlines.headline: VanEck to Shut Down Bitcoin Futures Fund, Focusing on Spot Bitcoin ETF
headlines.text: VanEck announced that it will be shutting down its Bitcoin Strategy ETF (XBTF), with trading set to cease on January 30th. XBTF is one of several ETFs that trade bitcoin futures contracts and has approximately $53 million in assets under management.

headlines.headline: Survey: Dogecoin Enthusiasts Eager to Utilize DOGE on X Platform
headlines.text: The @dogeofficialceo Twitter account, which focuses on Dogecoin, recently asked its followers if they would be willing to use DOGE for payments and tips on Twitter, if Elon Musk were to integrate it into the platform.

headlines.headline: Gemini, Winklevoss' crypto exchange, approved to launch in France amidst regulatory disputes in the U.S
headlines.text: In exclusive news shared with CNBC, Gemini, the virtual asset services provider (VASP) co-founded by the Winklevoss twins, Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss, has gained approval from the French AMF watchdog.

headlines.headline: ApeCoin Surges 10% on 'Dookey Dash' Free-to-Play Game Release
headlines.text: The price of the token associated with Bored Ape Yacht Club has increased after the news of a new free version of the BAYC game called Dookey Dash.

headlines.headline: Robinhood Purchases Billions of Shiba Inu (SHIB) Tokens: What You Need to Know
headlines.text: According to data from Arkham Intelligence, Robinhood, the well-known stock brokerage platform, has recently acquired a larger amount of Shiba Inu (SHIB), which is currently the second-largest cryptocurrency related to dogs, based on its market value.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin Rental Agreement Signed in Argentina, Marking a Milestone
headlines.text: Argentina embraces Bitcoin with the signing of its inaugural Bitcoin rental contract, prompted by significant changes made to contract laws in the country.

headlines.headline: ARK Invest, led by Cathie Wood, sells BITO shares to focus on their own Bitcoin ETF
headlines.text: ARK Invest has made a strategic move by including the Ark 21Shares Spot Bitcoin ETF (ARKB) in its Next Generation Internet ETF (ARKW). As part of this decision, the company sold off around $15 million worth of shares from the ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO).

headlines.headline: JPMorgan CEO Dimon Warns Against Involvement with Bitcoin
headlines.text: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon cautioned against investing in Bitcoin, the biggest cryptocurrency, during a recent interview with CNBC.

headlines.headline: Team Announces Major SHIB Giveaway, Prepare for an Intriguing Twist
headlines.text: The Shiba Inu team has shared exciting news about an upcoming giveaway in their latest issue of SHIB Magazine. However, they have also issued a crucial warning to the entire Shiba Inu community.

headlines.headline: Chainlink and Circle Partner for Seamless USDC Transfers Across Different Blockchains
headlines.text: Chainlink and Circle have joined forces to integrate their cross-chain communication protocols, CCIP and CCTP. This partnership will simplify and enhance the security of transferring the USDC stablecoin across various blockchains. Overall, this is positive news for the crypto industry as it promotes interoperability and facilitates efficient transactions.

headlines.headline: DOGE Joins XRP, SOL, and USDC Futures on Major Exchange
headlines.text: Dogecoin (DOGE), the cryptocurrency inspired by a popular dog meme, has achieved a significant milestone by getting listed on Binance, the largest crypto exchange globally in terms of trading volume.

headlines.headline: Vitalik Buterin highlights significance of Ethereum Layer 2s in latest statement
headlines.text: A recent discussion with Vitalik Buterin on X platform provides valuable insights into L2 networks, which are crucial for improving scalability in the Ethereum network.

headlines.headline: 12% of Salvadorans embraced Bitcoin for purchases in 2023
headlines.text: The survey, which spans 45 pages, does not inquire about the Bitcoin investments made by the government of El Salvador.

headlines.headline: Crypto Critic Peter Schiff Issues Warnings on Bitcoin Price
headlines.text: Prominent economist and cryptocurrency critic Peter Schiff has recently expressed concerns about the future of Bitcoin (BTC), offering a cautionary message.

headlines.headline: Binance Introduces DOGE Perpetual Contract with High Leverage
headlines.text: Binance Futures is planning to introduce a USDC-margined DOGE Perpetual Contract on January 18, 2024. This will allow users to trade Dogecoin with leverage of up to 75x.

headlines.headline: Ripple President Monica Long emphasizes the importance of crypto presence at Davos
headlines.text: Monica Long, the president of Ripple, a financial and cryptocurrency services company, has shared her thoughts on the involvement of cryptocurrency industry participants at the World Economic Forum (WEF) event in Davos.

headlines.headline: Socket and Bungee Resume Operations Following $3.3M Hack
headlines.text: The platform encountered a security incident on Tuesday that impacted wallets with unlimited approvals for Socket contracts, according to developers.

headlines.headline: Ripple cancels IPO amid SEC's crackdown on crypto, XRP price remains unimpressive
headlines.text: Ripple, a fintech company based in San Francisco, has decided not to go ahead with its plans for an initial public offering (IPO) in the United States. Additionally, the CEO of Ripple stated that they are now considering alternative options outside of the US due to unfavorable conditions.

headlines.headline: Uncertainty in Thai Crypto Market as SEC Rejects Bitcoin ETFs, Leaving Investors in Limbo
headlines.text: Thailand's financial regulators have indicated that they are not currently ready to permit the trading of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), even though the country is considered to be crypto-friendly.

headlines.headline: Theta Labs teams up with NHL's Vegas Golden Knights to offer NFT fan experiences
headlines.text: Theta Labs and the NHL's Vegas Golden Knights have joined forces to bring NFT-based fan experiences to the forefront of the changing sports landscape. Mitch Liu, the CEO of Theta Labs, expressed their excitement in being a part of this evolution alongside the Vegas Golden Knights.

headlines.headline: Bitcoin ETF Market Set to Grow as ProShares Launches New Leveraged and Inverse Offerings
headlines.text: Bloomberg's ETF analyst Henry Jim has announced that ProShares is making a series of new filings to bring more diversity to the Bitcoin ETF market. In the pipeline are five new Bitcoin ETFs that will offer leveraged and inverse options based on the daily performance of the Bloomberg Galaxy Bitcoin Index. This development is expected to provide more options and flexibility for investors in the cryptocurrency market.

headlines.headline: Elon Musk Confirms Ownership of Dogecoin, SpaceX Holds Bitcoin
headlines.text: Elon Musk, the CEO of Tesla and Spacex, recently confirmed that he continues to hold a significant amount of dogecoin, showing his ongoing support for the popular meme-based cryptocurrency. He also mentioned that Spacex retains a considerable amount of bitcoin.

headlines.headline: Crypto Exchange Socket Experiences Security Breach, Urgently Advises Users to Act Now
headlines.text: In a recent update, Socket Protocol, an interoperability protocol, announced a security breach. They advised users to take immediate action to avoid any potential loss of funds.

headlines.headline: Coinbase and SEC prepare for legal battle in court tomorrow
headlines.text: Coinbase, the popular cryptocurrency exchange, will be heading to federal court to face the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), after attempting to dismiss the regulatory body's case against it.

headlines.headline: IRS Delays Enforcement of $10K Crypto Tax Rule
headlines.text: The tax law is being revised to include crypto transactions worth over $10,000, treating them similarly to cash transactions. However, the final version of the law is still under development.
